abstract.t: This document defines the Origin attribute for cookies, which letsservers harmonize the security policy of their cookies with thewidely used same-origin policy. Origin cookies provide bothconfidentiality and integrity, unlike the Secure attribute, whichprovides only confidentiality.Editorial Note (To be removed by RFC Editor)If you have suggestions for improving this document, please sendemail to <mailto:http-state@ietf.org>.
